description:
Do you want to be Professional iOS Developer?
You want to create Complete Full Instagram Clone, or maybe Twitter, Facebook, Flickr, Tumblr or other?
You tired from courses that don't make you professional at completion and don't give you what you've expected.

THIS COURSE WILL CHANGE YOUR LIFE!

We are creating...
We will create Complete Social App Ready-To-Publich to AppStore, that can bring you side income. At the completion of the course, you will get all knowledges of social apps creation, building strong logics of app, app customization, app designing, social app features' programming and more. 
This course will move you to the highest level of programming and development.

Programming knowledges?
You don't need to have any programming knowledges, I will teach you all from scratch.
We will program our project in most professional manner, avoiding all bugs, mistakes and error, to let it work smoothly as it should. 
I'll write comments for all code lines. I'll explain you each line of code in easiest language.

You don't have Parse? 
Not a problem. In this course we are using Heroku as well, as our server-side.

The course teaches you to...
Become iOS Professional Programmer using Swift and Xcode.
Work with backend server.
Build application that communicates with backend server.
Create correct database structure.
Build right app logic.
Create outstanding designs for your app. All by yourself and with your hands.
Create professional UI and UX with deep programming.


Additionally you'll learn designing of your app. Fully customize app in way you like. I'll teach you how to work with shapes and create designs. Work with custom fonts. Create icons, design buttons, design app pages and many more.

Don't believe me? I offer a full money back guarantee, so long as you request it within 30 days of your purchase of the course.

I REGULARLY UPDATE COURSE WITH ADDITIONAL VIDEOS EXPLAINING DIFFERENT  AWESOME FEATURES. You can see new free videos in section "FREE UPDATE"

You'll get +20 hours video education of creating social app including coding, creating user interface, learning designing and many many more.

This is the only course that worth to go through! What are you waiting for?!!!
title: Create FULL INSTAGRAM Clone with Swift 2 and Xcode
